item.description: Basic configuration previewBasic configuration preview " Basic configuration preview 2 Avataravatar " Avatar 3 4 Note This article is a shameful copy of the great Grav original page. If you want to know about the extented Markdown syntax of LoveIt theme, please read extended Markdown syntax page. John Gruber, the author of Markdown, puts it like this: The overriding design goal for Markdown’s formatting syntax is to make it as readable as possible.
